text: Pen Pol taun Kolin tapɨn mɨdɨl, binɨb Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak okok kɨlop agak, Nɨbi mɨdem yad amebin agak. Agek, Akwila bin ne Plisila sek, bɨ bel ayɨp Siliya plopens amnun agɨl amnɨlak. Am am taun Senkliya amjakɨl, Pol yad God nop chɨgɨl nep yenɨgayn agɨl takaw aglɨlɨg, kɨmɨg wɨj ne ak tɨkak. Tɨkɨl, sip dɨl saŋɨdɨlak.
